definition[0]: to continue doing something the way you did or planned to do before
example[0]: Let’s stick with the original plans.
example[1]: You just stick with me. I’ll explain everything as we go along.
definition[2]: to continue doing something, especially something difficult
example[2]: If you stick with it, your playing will gradually get better.
definition[3]: to be made to accept something, do something, spend time with someone etc, when you do not want to
example[3]: Bill left and I was stuck with the bill.
example[4]: Those words will stick with me for the rest of my life.
